keyMoments.title: Goo Celebrates Shadow Return
keyMoments.description: Goo, a pirate captain, celebrates with his crew as their shadows return after being stolen by Moria two years ago. He expresses disbelief that Moria could be defeated, mentioning that Moria once fought equally with Kaidou.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the far-reaching impact of Moria's defeat and provides backstory about Moria's past strength.
keyMoments.quote: That's impossible! Moria fought equally with Kaidou, one of the Four Emperors!

reveals.information: Had his shadow stolen by Gecko Moria two years before the events of Thriller Bark

keyMoments.title: Asahija Celebrates Shadow Return
keyMoments.description: Asahija, a second-class Marine soldier, celebrates the return of his shadow that was stolen by Gecko Moria.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Moria stole shadows from Marines as well as pirates, demonstrating his indiscriminate collection.

reveals.information: Had his shadow stolen by Gecko Moria at some point before Thriller Bark

keyMoments.title: Margarita Reunites with Her Shadow
keyMoments.description: Margarita, a young waitress in West Blue, reunites with her shadow after ten years. Her employer Egana witnesses her joy and forgives her for breaking his rare plates.
keyMoments.significance: Provides a touching human moment and reveals that her shadow was used for Victoria Cindry's zombie body.

reveals.information: Her shadow was stolen by Gecko Moria ten years ago and used for the zombie Victoria Cindry

relationships.description: Margarita works as a waitress for Egana in West Blue.

evolutionMoments.description: Egana forgives Margarita for breaking his rare plates after witnessing her joy at her shadow's return.

keyMoments.title: Egana Forgives Margarita
keyMoments.description: Egana, a wealthy employer in West Blue, witnesses his waitress Margarita's joy at her shadow returning and forgives her for previously breaking his rare plates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows compassion and understanding in the aftermath of Moria's defeat.

reveals.information: Compassionate employer who forgives Margarita's mistakes

relationships.description: Egana employs Margarita as a waitress in his large house in West Blue.

evolutionMoments.description: Egana shows compassion by forgiving Margarita after witnessing her happiness.

name.japanese: バーソロミュー・くま

keyMoments.title: Kuma Receives Orders to Eliminate Witnesses
keyMoments.description: Kuma receives orders from the World Government to transport Moria back to headquarters and eliminate all witnesses on Thriller Bark, including the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the World Government's ruthless methods and sets up the immediate threat to the exhausted crew.

keyMoments.title: Kuma Removes His Gloves
keyMoments.description: Kuma removes his gloves to reveal the paw pads on his palms, preparing to use his Nikyu Nikyu no Mi powers.
keyMoments.significance: Signals that Kuma is about to use his Devil Fruit abilities seriously against the crew.

keyMoments.title: Kuma Demonstrates Paw-Paw Shockwaves
keyMoments.description: Kuma demonstrates his Nikyu Nikyu no Mi ability by launching paw-shaped shockwave blasts, sending people flying with devastating force.
keyMoments.significance: First major display of Kuma's offensive capabilities, showing the crew the level of threat they face.

keyMoments.title: Kuma Targets Zoro
keyMoments.description: Kuma declares his intention to begin eliminating the Straw Hats starting with their second-in-command, Roronoa Zoro.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the climactic confrontation between Kuma and the crew that will define the arc's conclusion.
keyMoments.quote: I'll begin with your second-in-command... Roronoa Zoro.

abilities.description: Kuma launches paw-shaped shockwave blasts that can send targets flying with tremendous force.

reveals.information: Receives orders from the World Government to eliminate all witnesses on Thriller Bark to cover up Moria's defeat

keyMoments.title: Zoro Prepares to Fight Kuma
keyMoments.description: Despite being completely exhausted from battles with Ryuma and Oars, Zoro readies himself to fight Bartholomew Kuma, standing as the first line of defense for the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's unwavering commitment to protecting the crew even at his physical limits, setting up his ultimate sacrifice.

keyMoments.title: Nami Warns About Kuma's Abilities
keyMoments.description: Nami remembers Kuma's previous appearance and warns the crew about his dangerous abilities, specifically mentioning how he made Perona disappear and can teleport instantly.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's strategic value and helps the crew understand the level of threat they're facing.
keyMoments.quote: Kuma is dangerous! He made Perona vanish with just a touch and can teleport in the blink of an eye!

keyMoments.title: Usopp Worries About Luffy's Future
keyMoments.description: Usopp expresses concern about Luffy pushing himself so hard with Gear Second and Gear Third, worrying about what will happen when they face even stronger enemies.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's growth in understanding the escalating dangers ahead and his genuine care for Luffy's wellbeing.
keyMoments.quote: Luffy keeps pushing himself so hard... What's going to happen when we face even stronger enemies?
